name: ASDA Grocery Store
special_instructions: The 'query' filter is required. If it is not provided, the tool will return an error.
The 'sort' filter can take one of the following values: 'relevance', 'price', 'sugar', 'salt', 'fat', 'carbohydrate', 'protein', 'fibre', 'energy', 'saturatedfat'.
The 'order' filter can take one of the following values: 'asc', 'desc'.
The 'category' filter can take one of the following values: 'Baby, Toddler & Kids', 'Bakery', 'Beer, Wine & Spirits', 'Better For You', 'Big Night In', 'Chilled Food', 'Drinks', '...'.
The 'limit' filter is used to limit the number of results returned by the tool.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
